snippet: Mr. Sanders said on Sunday that the Democratic convention would be contested because was “virtually impossible” for Hillary Clinton to reach a majority of convention delegates with pledged delegates alone.
abstract: Mr. Sanders said on Sunday that the Democratic convention would be contested because was “virtually impossible” for Hillary Clinton to reach a majority of convention delegates with pledged delegates alone.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Says Superdelegates Should Follow Voters’ Will in Landslide States
